2. City Officials

City Officials
==============

If a Conflict Disclosure Statement is filed with the City Secretary's office, it can be viewed by selecting the name of the city official.

This page is updated as a Disclosure Statement is received. Questions can be addressed to the City Secretary's Office.

City Officials
--------------

John Packer, Mayor
Griff Morris, Councilmember Place 1
William D. (Dee) Haddock, Councilmember Place 2
Lauren Haltom, Councilmember Place 3
Karlee Hubble, Councilmember Place 4
Richard Westerman, Councilmember Place 5
Craig Magerkurth, Councilmember Place 6
Caleb Kraenzel, City Manager
Russell Sander, Assistant City Manager
Christina McDonald, City Secretary
, Director of Finance
